snippet: In a bipartisan 75-to-32 vote, the State House gave final approval to a measure that would make almost a half-million more low-income adults eligible for Medicaid.
abstract: Michigan State House, in bipartisan 75-32 vote, gives final approval to measure that will make half-million more low-income adults eligible for Medicaid.
lead_paragraph: In a bipartisan 75-to-32 vote, the State House gave final approval to a measure that would make almost a half-million more low-income adults eligible for Medicaid.

headline.main: Michigan: State Ready to Expand Medicaid
headline.print_headline: Michigan: State Ready To Expand Medicaid

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
